WRITING.TITLE: 22 (M) ?/10 constructive criticism if possible please
WRITING.TEXT:
Posted a while back when i had long hair, and everybody told me to get it cut, got it cut recently and wondering what you all think i look like now
original post http://imgur.com/UgvdMiW
what i look like now http://imgur.com/TpDdoYC
Been told by alot of friends it looks much better but ya know friends dont generally say you look bad to your face lol
awesome website by looks of it, i'll check it out, thanks.

Thanks, i saw a couple of those, that third one is really nice, i think i have found the exact one ragnar has on amazon https://www.amazon.com/Asgard-Chunky-Pewter-Viking-Bracelet/dp/B007GADFSQ
http://www.themarysue.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/vikings-jewelry.jpg thats a picture of him holding it.

WRITING.TEXT: looking to get an ouroboros/jormungand bracelet like they sometimes wear in the show like the cast iron ones we sometimes see the main lot working, was looking through etsy but nothing on there seems similar

What you all think? :)
Thanks for taking your time out to replying, this game really does sound quite interesting, i think i'll buy it tomorrow
oh that sounds awesome, would i be ok at going straight with a mod or base game? playing game of thrones sounds awesome
seems a bit like total war games or am i completely mistaken from the screenshots? not that into total war warhammer from what i played

thanks, also another question, is two hours enough time to figure out if i would enjoy it? with it being 15 i wouldnt want to blow that money without knowing if i'd like it, or would i be better of trying it pirated and then buying if i enjoy it?
sounds interesting, i saw totalbiscuits video of it a while ago and it seemed really good, there's two different versions of it on steam, which version would you recommend personally?
what other games is mount and blade like? ive seen video's of it before but no idea if i'd enjoy it.
Will do :)
Thanks, its good seeing so many people say it would ;D
Thanks :)
Thank you :D
yeah, thats what i was thinking when i was looking at it, never really had to use any products to style or anything so would be new to me.
Thanks, been i was thinking of getting it cut like that like september last year but never went through with it, i think im gonna get it done on tuesday :D

his video's on youtube are all in rotherham, not many people know of that place outside of the uk or even in the uk unless its about paedo's lol i think he was fired from my place.
i might have served you a few times then crazy seeing somewhere you work on reddit lol
